title: Chapter 1572 - All Wrong
body:
Chapter 1572 - All Wrong

Su Yi glanced at the man in brocade robes. “There are no absolutes. Just because you can’t do something doesn’t mean others can’t.”

The old monsters were flabbergasted.

A moment later, they couldn’t help but laugh. This youngster obviously has no idea how difficult the Nine Steles of the Primeval Era are to grasp. Otherwise, he’d never have gotten hung up on an offhand comment like that!

When she saw the old monsters laugh, Qing Wei couldn’t help but smile. I’ll be interested to see whether you can still laugh in a bit!

“Does that mean you can see through the mysteries of the Nine Steles of the Primeval Era?” The man in brocade asked with a smile, the very picture of an older-generation cultivator quizzing a junior.

“Of course,” said Su Yi as if it were perfectly obvious. He didn’t even pause to think.

The crowd was stunned, to the point that they almost suspected they’d misheard him.

“Truly?” The man in brocade robes raised an eyebrow. “We old-timers disdain nothing more than empty boasting. I hope you’re not that type of person, Young Lord.”

Su Yi glanced at him and...
